CreateSavingsPlan.name: CreateSavingsPlan
CreateSavingsPlan.description: Grants permission to create a savings plan

DeleteQueuedSavingsPlan.name: DeleteQueuedSavingsPlan
DeleteQueuedSavingsPlan.description: Grants permission to delete the queued savings plan associated with customers account

DescribeSavingsPlanRates.name: DescribeSavingsPlanRates
DescribeSavingsPlanRates.description: Grants permission to describe the rates associated with customers savings plan

DescribeSavingsPlans.name: DescribeSavingsPlans
DescribeSavingsPlans.description: Grants permission to describe the savings plans associated with customers account

DescribeSavingsPlansOfferingRates.name: DescribeSavingsPlansOfferingRates
DescribeSavingsPlansOfferingRates.description: Grants permission to describe the rates assciated with savings plans offerings

DescribeSavingsPlansOfferings.name: DescribeSavingsPlansOfferings
DescribeSavingsPlansOfferings.description:
Grants permission to describe the savings plans offerings that customer is eligible
                                                to purchase

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a savings plan

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a savings plan

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a savings plan
